short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin for finding download resources for douban books.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
在豆瓣读书页面显示对应书籍的免费下载资源和线阅读资源。移动端、电脑端全平台支持。

Enhance your douban book website experience with your favourite ebook download resources and ebook online reading platforms.
